The Spurs have officially announced the three-team trade with the Celtics and Nuggets.

-Bryn Forbes to Denver

-Juancho Hernangomez/protected second-rounder/cash considerations to San Antonio

-Bol Bol and PJ Dozier to Boston
27: Spurs officially announce they have acquired Juancho Hernangómez, cash considerations from Boston, a protected 2028 second round pick, cash considerations from Denver.San Antonio sends Bryn Forbes to Denver, while Boston acquires Bol Bol, PJ Dozier from Nuggets #PorVida #nba75
28:
Now the Boston-Denver-San Antonio trade is complete:

Bryn Forbes is the first rostered player the Spurs have traded away in-season since Nando De Colo in 2014.
29:
The #Spurs three-team deal with Boston and Denver has been made official. 

Juancho Hernangomez will wear No. 41 for San Antonio.
30: Spurs make the three-team trade that sent out Bryn Forbes and sent Juancho Hernangomez to San Antonio official
31: The three-team trade between the Nuggets, Celtics and Spurs is now official. In addition to acquiring Juancho Hernangomez and a second-round pick from the Nuggets, San Antonio also acquired cash considerations from both Denver and Boston.
